longBusinessSummary: Sany Heavy Equipment International Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of integrated excavation machinery, integrated coal mining equipment, and coal mine transportation equipment. It operates in two segments, Mining Equipment and Logistic Equipment. The Mining Equipment segment provides coal mining machinery products, including roadheaders, such as soft rocks and hard rock roadheaders, integrated excavation, bolting, and self-protection machinery; mining equipment consisting of coal mining machines (shearer), hydraulic supports, scraper conveyors (armored-face conveyer), etc.; non-coal mining machinery products comprising tunnel roadheaders and mining machines; mining transport equipment, including mechanical drive off-highway and electric drive off-highway dump trucks, widebody vehicles, and spare parts; and other relevant products. The Logistic Equipment segment offers container equipment, such as front loaders, stacking machines and quayside gantry cranes, etc.; bulk material equipment, which comprise grippers, elevated hoisting arms, etc.; and general equipment, including heavy-duty forklift trucks, telehandlers, etc., as well as electric stacking machines, steel and material grippers, and second-generation and unmanned electric trucks. In addition, the company provides maintenance and property development services. It operates in Mainland China, rest of Asia, the European Union, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenyang, the People's Republic of China. Sany Heavy Equipment International Holdings Company Limited is a subsidiary of Sany Hongkong Group Limited.
longName: Sany Heavy Equipment International Holdings Company Limited
